title: The Cleansing Wave
presentation: v1 c v2 c v3 c

v1: Oh, now I see the cleansing wave!
Jesus, my Lord, mighty to save,
v2: I see the dear Redeemer raised,
It speaks! My spirit is amazed!
v3: I rise to walk in God's own light
With heart renewed and garments white
c1: The cleansing stream I see, I see;
I plunge, and oh, it cleanses me!
Oh, praise the Lord, it cleanses me!
It cleanses me, yes, cleanses me!
